website_summaries.verdict: A stand-out piece with plenty of character. The style can fit into traditional and contemporary homes alike.
pros: Notable for its unusual design, this strong and stable coffee table is crafted with an eye-catching style
The distressed wood top evokes a driftwood effect
cons: Each table is different and some users are disappointed it did not match the display model

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Great table, took less than 20 minutes to put together. It's very durable, the wheels alone are pretty heavy, definitely adds a lot of character to the room. I got a lot of compliments about the table. Unfortunately no drawers, but you can still store plenty of books, magazines, throw pillows and whatever else in there. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anton Antipov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is large and in charge so make sure you have a larger area for it. Also problem here guys... all the pretty paint on the wheels is starting to chip off and i can tell its going to look crappy in a few more months. NOTE TO SELLER: apply a chip resistant paint on ALL WHEELS. Also top piece of wood did not match the color of the bottom piece of wood. kinda bugs me.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, wish It held up better
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the wood gets nicked and dinged really easily and it's already splintering. The wood is just really poor quality and doesn't hold up to the regular wear and tear of a coffee table. Even with judicious use of the coasters. Basic cleaning products disintegrate the wood and cause it to splinter.
customer_reviews.author: Velodious

customer_reviews.title: fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, fairly easy to put together. A dust cloth can snag on the wood a bit, as it is a textured wood not smooth, which adds to the rustic look. I love it. PS The knock off brand of these the wood color is much different more brown red than brown grey like the Ashley. Very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Weaber

customer_reviews.title: Look I really like the design and concept but the color is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery: I received the item 4 days after the last day of delivery window! I also paid extra for fast delivery and I never got refunded for that! Look I really like the design and concept but the color is not that good in my opinion Assembly It was relatively easy to assemble. A couple of screws were missing. It took me 3 hours to assemble the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had to drill holes in one of the thick metal plates
customer_reviews.text: I had to drill holes in one of the thick metal plates as the holes were not in the correct place. Only one of the four was incorrect, the others were fine. It was pretty obvious though so the QA process for this furniture is not great. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy table. Simple to assemble as well. I will say it's worth the money. I unfortunately had to return it because the color of the wood was much lighter than described. I needed a darker stain.
customer_reviews.author: Latesa

customer_reviews.title: Not practical for cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Table looks great but will not last long. It's already chipped. It is very hard to dust as it snags dust cloth. I'm very disappointed as this was the style I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Marelorline

customer_reviews.title: Great table, FYI big wheels dont move.. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice and sturdy table. Just a few things to note: the big wheels you are looking at DO NOT move. I have taken a star away because the underside of the table was chipped, not a major issue as it cannot be seen.
customer_reviews.author: A72K

customer_reviews.text: Great looking table. Ours had many spots where paint came off. Hard to put together without someone helping. I put it together alone, so it can be done. Heavy and wheels stick out. So if you stub your toe a lot this is probably not the table for you.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Table is NOT the color advertised
customer_reviews.text: The color of the table does NOT match the photo they advertise with!!!!! The wood veneer is much more grey in tones and does not even appear to be wood! It is blatant it is fake! Now the seller will not except my return so if you want to throw away almost $300 on furniture that does not match ANYTHING, then this is your best bet
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Plante

customer_reviews.title: Sad that it’s peeling apart
customer_reviews.text: It’s gorgeous but we have been using it for about one month and the corner is peeling off.. thought it was real wood but doesn’t seem to be... disappointed because it’s such a beautiful table but didn’t expect it to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: aurora mosher

customer_reviews.title: Chipping & Snagging!
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this table... but since buying about a month ago, it's already chipping & snagging. You can't even clean the top because of the way the wood is. As much as I like the design, I would not recommend this coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: C.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table. It's nice and sturdy, pretty heavy actually. The table was very easy to assemble, only taking about 20 minutes by myself. I get compliments on consistently. I highly recommend purchasing it if you are considering.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Adorable table as far as the instruction confusion I think ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable table as far as the instruction confusion I think that depends on the individual The one problem is when you dust it you have to go One Direction or you will get splinters other than that adorable table for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have to replace wood , but love the design. Cost to much to return.
customer_reviews.text: The wood or whatever it is ,spinners and when I tried cleaning the top with a damp rag ,the varnish came off in places.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora B .

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assy, nice parts package
customer_reviews.text: lighter in color than expected , sturdy, way better value than Ashley Store!!! Two days early on shipping...buy it!
customer_reviews.author: vickie mclelland

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Always gets compliments, heavier than expected but Im good with that
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and low quality. Pre installed some Screws connecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and low quality. Pre installed some Screws connecting board to frame were dislodged. Others were splintered or loosened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the table
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Good quality, fairly easy to assemble. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: CatMaster12

customer_reviews.title: ... this almost 4 days prior to the guaranteed date easy to assemble very happy with the product would definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this almost 4 days prior to the guaranteed date easy to assemble very happy with the product would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Brett Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: MUCH lighter wood that in the pic and the wood looks VERY fake
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together but I will say the so called "wood" looks darker in the picture than in real life. It looks VERY fake and much lighter in color which I don't like but I have decided to keep it just cause the hassle of returning it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Well built, easy to assemble, everyone who sees it comments how nice it is
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: So dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have two week with this table and that fake wood is falling apart and i dont use that table. So dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Yohanny urena

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the table. The only issue I see is that the wood spilters on the edges all the way around it. A little concern how it will look in a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, will stand up to feet, spills and lots of use.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. Should last for many, many years. Very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer if it was real wood and might change ...
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer if it was real wood and might change it out at a later date with two pieces of real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Rowanne C Uselton

customer_reviews.title: Great price and was delivered waaaayyy earlier than estimated
customer_reviews.text: I looooove this coffee table. Great price and was delivered waaaayyy earlier than estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Erika webster

customer_reviews.title: The coffee table is nice. The only issue I have had is with ...
customer_reviews.text: The coffee table is nice. The only issue I have had is with top. Either trying to clean it you could get a possible splinter. I would think it would have been smoothed off for that possibility not to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coffee table. Easy to put together. The bottom of the coffee table is great for storing throw pillows when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very to assemble and is very good quality, very sturdy and a great look.
customer_reviews.author: N. E. JONES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the styling of this, exactly as pictured. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: gb24

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: Great table and easy to assemble. Looks great in our living room!
customer_reviews.author: CKJ

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! Very well made (sturdy & easy to move).
customer_reviews.author: Jan Wagner

customer_reviews.title: High quality table and easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, rustic, industrial coffee table! I put this together on my own in about 30-40 minutes for a gift for my husband. It's great quality, very hefty. The big side wheels are locked in place so those do not roll. The smaller wheels in the ends swivel and roll. You could easily lift one side and roll it to move it around, but when it sits flat it's not budging. I love the surface space it allows but because it's open in the bottom, it makes the room feel larger.
customer_reviews.author: Linjpow

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very happy with it and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a beautiful coffee table, the details are amazing! I used it with my Chamberly Sectional Sofa and the matching end table. I love the wheels on this gives it an awesome Farmhouse feel! It was easy to put together and the quality is great! I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Abnet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too cute! Very solid very edgy.Well worth it's price
customer_reviews.author: Barbiedoll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well made table that works well with both rustic and industrial decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Vennilux Coffee Table - Cocktail Height - Rectangular - Metal Base with Brown Top
feature_bullets: INDUSTRIAL STYLE COFFEE TABLE: Inspired by vintage factory carts, the mix of metal details and rustic driftwood-like finishes are a natural match for any traditional or modern living room
HANDSOMELY CRAFTED: Cocktail table is made of veneers, manmade wood and metal. Designed with decorative cast-metal wheels and a fixed storage shelf
WEATHERWORN LOOK: The wire-brushed tabletop stain evokes a reclaimed wood quality that's sure to charm, making it the perfect signature touch in your living space
SPACIOUS DESIGN: Measuring 50" W x 28" D x 19.5" H, there's plenty of space for you to display your favorite photos and home decor accents
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
